title: Presidential Permit Authorizing Cameron County, Texas to Construct, Maintain, and Operate a Pedestrian Border Crossing at the Gateway International Bridge Land Port of Entry
summary: This presidential action grants Cameron County, Texas a permit to construct, maintain, and operate a pedestrian border crossing at the Gateway International Bridge Land Port of Entry on the United Statesâ€“Mexico border in Brownsville, Texas. The authorization is issued subject to the conditions specified in the Presidential Permit Application for Cameron County Gateway International and related materials, and it facilitates the establishment and operation of the pedestrian crossing in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.
